title: [NGC] Wave Race - Blue Storm USA_PROPER_NGC-STARCUBE
description:

   /                 /______:       :       ._        /      ._        /     /

          |/        /      |       |       |              /_______/
                   /_________/___  |_______|/       /   _________  |
    _____._____/_/              /:       / ______/__/         )/ |
          :                         .       (                    /  |
          |                                    proudly presents     |
          |                                                          |
          |                                                          |
       (1)>>             <> Wave Race - Blue Storm <>               <<)
          |                                                          |
          |                                                          |
          | Origin...: USA              Filename...: S3-WRBSU.RAR(ISO)
          | Released.: 1st Nov, 2003    GOD / Rars.: 1 / 21x50MB     |
          | Console..: GAMECUBE         Format.....: .ISO            |
          | Source...: GC Optical Disc  Supply.....: STARCUBE        |
          | Company..: Nintendo         Store Date.: 18th Nov, 2001  |
          |                                                          |
          |                                                          |
       (2)>> Game Info:                                             <<)
          |                                                          |
          | Storm warning! Prepeare for the wettest, wildest racing  |
          | ever as Wave Race splashes onto the Nintendo GameCube!   |
          | Challenge up to three of your friends as you hit the     |
          | water and try to make them eat your wake! Shortcuts      |
          | abound in unlikely places - sometimes you might even     |
          | have to smash your own route to win! Use the new turbo   |
          | feature to blast ahead of the pack or to launch yourself |
          | over wild shortcuts! Race against seven other riders     |
          | through four circuits to become the ultimate Wave Race   |
          | champion! Variable weather can transform a gentle cove   |
          | into surging stormwater, so be ready for anything...     |
          | Bust out all your wildest tricks and hugest jumps as you |
          | compete for high scores and bragging rights! From        |
          | jumping killer whales to lightning-struck trees, the     |
          | environments are constantly changing.                    |
          |                                                          |
          | Turn off music to remove in-game noise and allow saving  |
          | after competition.                                       |
          |                                                          |
          |                                                          |
       (3)>> Release Notes:                                         <<)
          |                                                          |
          |                                                          |
          | This is a proper dump of Wave Race Blue Storm USA        |
          | previously released by Rare. Rare's release has over 100 |
          | megabytes of corruption (not including garbage) and does |
          | not work.  This version, as with all Starcube releases   |
          | works.                                                   | 
          |                                                          |
          |                                                          |
       (4)>> Greetings:                                             <<)
          |                                                          |
          | Nintendo, Atari, Konami, Namco, Capcom, Sega, SCEI,      |
          | Hudson, Square Enix, SNK, Tecmo, Treasure, Ancient,      |
          | Irem & Rockstar Games, and all our friends.              |
          |                                                          |
          |                                                          |
         /|                                                          |
        /_|\(>>   " Look up at the sky, and try to find us "   <<)//|_
          :                                                          :
=================

Install "Nintendont" in your Wii/vWii (WiiU) using HomeBrew Channel and play this game Works on HDD and SD card
